title: Language Practical Competency Enhancement Course Through Experiential Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language theory knowledge and practical experience
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive language training program for in-service professionals applying design-based research (DBR) methodology through an online learning platform

learning_goals: Learners will integrate theoretical knowledge with practical experience by solving authentic language problems similar to real-world workplace scenarios
Learners will apply the mARC model (Authenticity, Reflection, Collaboration) to create three or more self-directed reflective journals
Learners will perform five or more peer feedback sessions using online collaboration tools and meet 80% or more of the requirements when submitting the final language project report
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
